name: Validate Datastore and Cloud SQL
description: An Apache Beam batch pipeline that compares the data in Datastore and Cloud SQL database.

parameters.name: isolationOverride
parameters.label: The desired SQL transaction isolation level.
parameters.helpText: The desired SQL transaction isolation level.

parameters.name: sqlSnapshotId
parameters.label: The ID of an exported Cloud SQL (Postgresql) snapshot.
parameters.helpText: The ID of an exported Cloud SQL (Postgresql) snapshot.

parameters.name: latestCommitLogTimestamp
parameters.label: Nomulus CommitLog start time
parameters.helpText: The latest entity update time allowed for inclusion in validation, in ISO8601 format.

parameters.name: comparisonStartTimestamp
parameters.label: Only entities updated at or after this time are included for validation.
parameters.helpText: The earliest entity update time allowed for inclusion in validation, in ISO8601 format.
